topics.name: Energy & Cost Savings
topics.description: Reduce energy costs by up to 45% with intelligent automation

hotspots.title: Centralized Monitoring & AI Insights
hotspots.description: Monitor HVAC, lighting, and equipment status in real-time from a single platform. Bodhi's AI detects inefficiencies and recommends actions - reducing the need to check multiple systems manually.

hotspots.title: Measurable Energy Savings
hotspots.description: Track actual savings compared to baseline with clear ROI metrics. Properties typically see 30-45% reduction in energy costs while maintaining - or improving - guest comfort.

hotspots.title: AI-Powered Personalization
hotspots.description: Bodhi learns guest preferences and occupancy patterns to create tailored experiences. Rooms are automatically optimized before arrival - ideal temperatures, personalized lighting scenes - enhancing comfort while eliminating energy waste.

hotspots.title: Smart Temperature Scheduling
hotspots.description: Set temperature schedules that automatically adjust based on check-in/check-out times and occupancy.

hotspots.title: Zone Control
hotspots.description: Manage temperature zones across your property from a single view. Group rooms by floor, building, or custom zones.

topics.name: Guest Experience
topics.description: Delight guests with seamless digital experiences

hotspots.title: Seamless Mobile Key Access
hotspots.description: Deliver an exceptional guest experience from the moment they arrive. Guests unlock their room with a single tap - no waiting at the front desk, no lost key cards. This frictionless entry sets the tone for a luxurious, effortless stay.

hotspots.title: One-Tap Privacy Controls
hotspots.description: Guests control their privacy instantly. DND status syncs automatically with housekeeping schedules, eliminating awkward interruptions and ensuring every guest feels respected and comfortable.

hotspots.title: Instant Service Requests
hotspots.description: Requests for cleaning, towels, or amenities route directly to the right team. No phone calls, no waiting on hold. Guests get faster service, and your staff gets clear, actionable requests.

hotspots.title: Effortless Valet Services
hotspots.description: One tap to request their vehicle. Guests are notified when their car is ready - no standing around waiting. These small touches add up to glowing reviews and repeat bookings.

hotspots.title: Personalized Scenes
hotspots.description: One-tap scenes like 'Good Morning', 'Relax', or 'Grand Welcome' instantly adjust lighting, temperature, and shades. Guests feel pampered with automated settings that create the perfect ambiance.

hotspots.title: Lighting & Shades Control
hotspots.description: Full control over room lighting and drapes from one screen. Guests can dim lights, close blackout shades, or create their ideal environment without hunting for switches.

hotspots.title: Climate Control
hotspots.description: Guests set their ideal temperature and Bodhi remembers their preferences for future stays. No more too-hot or too-cold complaints - just personalized comfort.

hotspots.title: AI-Powered Concierge
hotspots.description: Guests can ask anything - dinner recommendations, amenity hours, nearby attractions, or report issues. Bodhi GPT provides instant, accurate answers 24/7, reducing front desk calls while improving guest satisfaction.

hotspots.title: Smart Suggestions
hotspots.description: Pre-built prompts help guests discover what they need faster. From 'What are the dinner options?' to 'I'd like to report an issue' - common requests are just one tap away.

hotspots.title: Full TV Remote Access
hotspots.description: No more hunting for lost remotes. Guests control the TV from their phone - power, volume, channels, and streaming apps. It's familiar, intuitive, and always within reach.

hotspots.title: Restaurant Discovery
hotspots.description: Guests explore on-site dining options with menus, hours, and reservation links. From casual buffets to fine dining - all the information they need to plan their perfect meal.

hotspots.title: Spa & Wellness
hotspots.description: Discover spa services, book treatments, and plan wellness activities. Guests can browse available services and book directly from the app.

hotspots.title: Activities & Entertainment
hotspots.description: From golf to nightlife, guests discover everything your property offers. Rich descriptions and booking options turn curiosity into reservations.

hotspots.title: Real-Time Room Status
hotspots.description: Your team sees check-in status, occupancy, and service requests across all rooms at a glance. Preemptive room checks ensure everything is perfect before guests arrive.

hotspots.title: Housekeeping Optimization
hotspots.description: See which rooms have DND enabled to optimize housekeeping routes. Your team knows exactly which rooms to clean and when - no wasted trips, no guest disturbances.

hotspots.title: Service Request Tracking
hotspots.description: All guest requests in one place. Track status, assign staff, and ensure nothing falls through the cracks. Faster response times mean happier guests.

hotspots.title: Multi-Property View
hotspots.description: Manage all your properties from one dashboard. Switch between properties or view portfolio-wide metrics.

hotspots.title: Proactive Alerts
hotspots.description: Bodhi AI detects potential issues before they become problems. Get alerts for leaks, temperature anomalies, and equipment issues.

hotspots.title: Ticket Management
hotspots.description: Maintenance tickets auto-generate from alerts. Track status, assign staff, and monitor resolution times.

hotspots.title: Preemptive Issue Detection
hotspots.description: Bodhi continuously monitors for leaks, HVAC issues, and equipment anomalies. Problems are flagged before guests notice - giving your team time to resolve issues proactively, not reactively.

hotspots.title: Predictive Maintenance with AI
hotspots.description: Bodhi's AI identifies equipment issues before failure, enabling repairs on YOUR schedule. No more emergency callouts, no more firefighting. Your team spends less time reacting and more time on planned, high-value work.

hotspots.title: Device Inventory
hotspots.description: View and manage all connected devices. Monitor battery levels, connectivity status, and firmware versions.

hotspots.title: Remote Configuration
hotspots.description: Update device settings remotely. Push firmware updates across your entire portfolio at once.

hotspots.title: Hardware Agnostic Integration
hotspots.description: Bodhi supports BACnet, KNX, Modbus, and REST APIs - no vendor lock-in. Works with your existing HVAC, lighting, AV, and access control systems without needing replacements or extra configuration work.

hotspots.title: Secure Open API
hotspots.description: SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified. End-to-end encryption with strict user access controls. Full REST API for custom integrations - connect Bodhi to your existing tech stack while meeting rigorous security standards.
